question: Which of the following statements is true regarding Ombudsman Scheme for NBFC?
option1: Section 45L of the RBI Act, 1934 confers powers on RBI to notify such scheme
option2: NBFCs having customer interface, with assets size of one billion rupees or above are eligible to be
option3: The scheme is initially being introduced at the four metro centers
explanation: Section 45L of the RBI Act, 1934 confers powers on RBI to notify such scheme. NBFCs having customer interface, with assets size of one billion rupees or above are eligible to be covered under the scheme. The scheme is initially being introduced at the four metro centers.
